sentences.english: Objective To assess and design of internal quality control procedures of the coagulation test.
sentences.chinese: 目的對凝血試驗試驗項目的質控方法進行評價和設計。

sentences.english: May potentiate oral anticoagulants, others that prolong bleeding.
sentences.chinese: 口服抗凝血劑，會增強，也有人認爲延長出血。

sentences.english: Anticoagulants are effective in selected cases of disseminated intravascular coagulation.
sentences.chinese: 抗凝劑對於某些瀰漫性血管內凝血的病例還是有效的。

sentences.english: Plasma fibrinogen levels were assayed by tissue thromboplastin.
sentences.chinese: 採用組織凝血活酶法測定血漿纖維蛋白原水平。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the anticoagulant rodenticides for Rattus flavipectus control.
sentences.chinese: 目的爲控制黃胸鼠篩選適口性較好的抗凝血滅鼠劑。

sentences.english: Additionally, thrombomodulin can entirely inhibit thrombin and ristocetin-induced platelet aggregation.
sentences.chinese: 能完全抑制由凝血酶和瑞斯托黴素誘導的血小板聚集。

sentences.english: There, the existence of a superior blood-clotting bandage can mean the difference between life and death.
sentences.chinese: 在那兒，如果有優良的凝血繃帶就意味着生死之差。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE The aim of current study was to prepare and characterize novel iron heparin nanoparticles.
sentences.chinese: 目的製備一種新型具有抗凝血活性的肝素鐵納米粒。

sentences.english: Conclusion Heparin plasma is suitable for testing the above eight emergency bio.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討肝素抗凝血漿用於急診生化檢驗的可行性。

sentences.english: The effect of decoction of ginger charcoal on blood coagulation time ten…
sentences.chinese: 姜炭水煎液對小鼠的凝血作用有隨劑量增加的趨勢。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the clinical significance of coagulation function in acute progressive cerebral infarction (APCI).
sentences.chinese: 目的探討凝血功能檢測在急性進展性腦梗死中的作用。

sentences.english: Ecchymoses are larger than petechiae. They can appear with coagulation disorders.
sentences.chinese: 出現於凝血系統功能障礙。

sentences.english: Not recommended during pregnancy or for patients on anti-coagulant therapy.
sentences.chinese: 不建議在懷孕期間或抗凝血劑治療的患者。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate preoperative coagulation testing in patients underwent liver resections.
sentences.chinese: 目的評價肝葉切除術患者術前凝血試驗的價值。

sentences.english: You may also be given an additional medication called an anticoagulant.
sentences.chinese: 您可能還給予額外的藥物稱爲抗凝血劑。

sentences.english: Life and death literally depend on a finely tuned blood-clotting system.
sentences.chinese: 生命的生與死完全取決於一套精準而有序的凝血系統。

definition: hemolysis (breakdown of red blood cells leading to anemia)
